title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 448.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 448.1 - Definitions

State Regulations

When used in this Part, the terms set forth in this
section shall be interpreted in accordance with the following
definitions: (a) Child
shall mean a person who has not attained his 21st
birthday, and, except for a sibling or a child whose mother is placed in the
same facility, is at least five years of age. (b) Sibling
shall mean a
child who has a common parent with another child. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
448.1

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
